abilities.name: Energy Jump
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before you attack) you may move an energy card from 1 of your Pokémon to another of your Pokémon. This power can't be used if Alakazam is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Psychic
attacks.effect: This attack does 30 damage plus 10 more damage for each energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon.
